title: Riverford Field Kitchen Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Riverford Farm is organic and provides produce box schemes throughout England. At the Field Kitchen they serve fresh organic food from the farm. The menu is set, and you get to sit on tables of 8 so you share with others to make up the numbers. The staff brings out 6 plates of food, five of which are vegetables. Will cater for vegans and vegetarians with advance notice. The restaurant is based at the farm and offers farm walks.
